Text: please help me out. I installed Win 7 x64 with an older loader like v.09 something... is this bad? do i have to keep updating it or as long as im still activated i should leave it like that? please let me know. thanks

HEllo,

If you activated with "Windows Loader 2.0.9 By Daz" you can update with out problems.

Cheers
does this work without any problems? i remember a loader by daz i had a few months ago but when i tried activating it, windows 7 didn't even boot.
ya what you said was right.it happened due to the loader changing your boot sector, fixing of your boot sector will fix the boot problem>
Thanks Thumper it worked fine and iam now runing a genuine version
OK, so two questions. Will my Windows be updateable and will it work after installing SP1
@ zlatantz -- Yes, and yes. You can update to date, and in the future, no problem.
